dublin_core.dcvalue: A unidirectional clinical pathway for acute myocardial infarction from out of hospital setting to the coronary care unit and catheterization laboratory could lead to mortality reduction The ongoing Progetto Torino Network Gestione globale dell infarto miocardico acuto prime ore dal territorio all ospedale is based on this statement and described in the three structural diagnostic therapeutical multimedial issues This project represents the historical evolution of our involvement in out of hospital cardiac emergency management
Italian heart journal. Supplement : official journal of the Italian Federation of Cardiology
[The Torino Network Project. Global management of acute myocardial infarction from the field to the hospital].
